1{-# LANGUAGE FlexibleInstances #-}
2{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
3{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
4
5-- | Short sign.
6
7module Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Short
8  ( -- * Data type
9    Short (..), ShortDef,
10  
11    -- * Utility
12    shortTrim, --shortM,
13    shortListM,
14    shortGroup,
15  
16    -- * Shorten
17    shortText,
18  ) where
19
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                 as O
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.AngleText  as S
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Symbol.Symbol     as S
24
25
26-- ----------------------  Data type
27
28-- | Something with short definition.
29data Short t a =
30    Short { shortSource :: [B.TCodePos t]  -- ^ Source information
31          , shortHead   :: [ShortDef t]   -- ^ Definition of short signs
32          , shortBody   :: a            -- ^ Body with short signs
33          } deriving (Show, Ord, Eq)
34
35-- | Short prefix and replacement.
36type ShortDef t = (t, t)
37
38instance Functor (Short t) where
39    fmap f (Short pt he bo) = Short pt he $ f bo
40
41-- | Omit empty body.
42shortTrim :: O.Map [Short t [a]]
43shortTrim = B.omit $ null . shortBody
44
45-- | Evaluate body of short structure.
46shortM :: (Monad m) => Short t (m a) -> m (Short t a)
47shortM (Short pt he bo) = return . Short pt he O.# bo
48
49-- | Evaluate body of short structures.
50shortListM :: (Monad m) => [Short t (m a)] -> m [Short t a]
51shortListM = mapM shortM
52
53-- | Group short structures.
54shortGroup :: (Eq t) => [Short t a] -> [Short t [a]]
55shortGroup [] = []
56shortGroup (Short cp1 sh1 a : xs) =
57    case shortGroup xs of
58      Short _ sh2 as : xs' | sh1 == sh2  -> Short cp1 sh1 (a:as) : xs'
59      []                                 -> [Short cp1 sh1 [a]]
60      xs'                                -> Short cp1 sh1 [a] : xs'
61
62
63-- ----------------------  Shorten
64
65-- | String shortener.
66--
67--   >>> shortText [("f", "foo/bar/")] "foo/bar/baz"
68--   Just "f.baz"
69--
70--   >>> shortText [("f", "foo/bar/")] "foo/baz"
71--   Nothing
72--
73shortText :: forall t. (O.Textual t) => [ShortDef t] -> B.TransText t
74shortText = loop . reverse . B.sortWith len where
75    len :: ShortDef t -> Int
76    len = O.tLength . snd
77
78    loop :: [ShortDef t] -> B.TransText t
79    loop [] _ = Nothing
80    loop ((prefix, replace) : sh) s =
81        case O.tDropPrefix replace s of
82          Just s2   -> Just $ prefix O.++ ('.' O.<:> text2 s2)
83          _         -> loop sh s
84
85    text2 s | isGeneralText s  = s
86            | otherwise        = S.angleQuote s
87
88-- | Test text value is general sign.
89isGeneralText :: (O.Textual t) => O.Test t
90isGeneralText = O.tAll S.isGeneralChar
91
